mapper.sql: t.product_id, t.product_name, t.follow_time, t.expect_price, t.start_price, t.product_type, t.brand_type, t.five_level, t.reference, t.product_die, t.is_visible,cbi.box_text as brand_name
mapper.select:
select
from su_product t left join comb_box_item cbi on cbi.box_code= t.brand_type and cbi.box_name='brandName' where t.product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from su_product t left join comb_box_item cbi on cbi.box_code= t.brand_type and cbi.box_name='brandName'
and t.brand_type=#{brandType}
and t.product_name like '%${productName}%'
mapper.insert: insert into su_product (product_id, product_name, follow_time, expect_price, start_price, product_type, brand_type, five_level, reference, product_die, is_visible) values (#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{followTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expectPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{startPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fiveLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productDie,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isVisible,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into su_product
product_id,
product_name,
follow_time,
expect_price,
start_price,
product_type,
brand_type,
five_level,
reference,
product_die,
is_visible,

mapper.update:
update su_product
product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
follow_time = #{followTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
expect_price = #{expectPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
start_price = #{startPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_type = #{brandType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
five_level = #{fiveLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reference = #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_die = #{productDie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_visible = #{isVisible,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update su_product set product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, follow_time = #{followTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, expect_price = #{expectPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, start_price = #{startPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_type = #{brandType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, five_level = #{fiveLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reference = #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_die = #{productDie,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_visible = #{isVisible,jdbcType=INTEGER} where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
